thread.title_full: Power Meter City reviewed by Joe K

author: Joe K
title: Joe K
text: Power Meter City (PMC) has been exceptional at taking care of my needs. I bought a 4iiii Precision power meter and absolutely love it. My ability to achieve focused training has improved dramatically. However, the first unit had some problems with determining battery condition and waking up for use. After several interactions with 4iiii that did not result in improvement, Josh at PMC quickly exchanged the unit for a new one. He also helped me with my interactions with 4iiii. PMC gave me confidence that I wasn't alone with my problem and that there was a commitment to resolving issues. The only place I would consider buying a bicycle power meter from is Power Meter City.
